title: Clean Energy Tax Credit Map
subtitle: The Inflation Reduction Act (IRA) is putting tens of billions of dollars on the table to support solar development in marginalized communities. We built this tool to help you determine whether projects in your community are eligible.
description: This mapping tool combines geographic criteria used to determine eligibility for two IRA tax credit programs: the Low-Income Communities Bonus Energy Investment Credit and Energy Communities Programs. It also includes areas likely to be prioritized based on Additional Selection Criteria released in June 2023.
